mobileResponsivenessTip: Optimize images and reduce their size to improve loading times on mobile devices.
loadingSpeedTip: Minimize JavaScript and use browser caching to improve page load speed.
seoOptimizationTip: Add more specific keywords and metadata to improve search engine visibility.
userExperienceTip: Ensure a consistent design and navigation across all devices to enhance the user experience.
bookingFlowTip: Simplify the booking process by reducing the number of steps to complete a reservation.
